trends: There has been one other sighting in Osgood
There were no other sightings in Osgood on or around April 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsTo those in Indiana Please get photos and try to Video tape all the events happening there. Your area has been chosen as the new hot spot for activity. We all want to see whats going on out your way. They will be back tonight as usually a Flap lasts about a week or two and they will return to the same area. Now that they know people and Media are watching they will show up again. Please record these events like they did in Stephenville TX and post the pictures or Videos on here.
Summary: People in Indiana Get Photos and Videos of Events the UFOs will be back tonight.
